This app uses your device\'s location to calculate accurate prayer times relevant to your geographical area.

To ensure continuous prayer time updates and automatically activate Do Not Disturb mode at the correct times, the app requires background location access (even when the app is closed or not in use).

We want to assure you that we do not:
  • Collect your precise or approximate location data persistently.
  • Store your location data on our servers.
  • Share your location data with any third parties.
  • Collect any other personal information.
What We Store Locally (On Your Device):

To ensure continuous and accurate prayer time updates, the app stores only your last known location (latitude and longitude) locally on your device.This is necessary for the core functionality of the app to work as designed, this data is used solely for the purpose of detecting location changes. This location data is overwritten whenever your device\'s location changes, no history of location data is maintained on your device and no data is sent to our servers or shared externally.

The app will request permission to access your device\'s location. You can choose to grant or deny this permission. If you deny background location permission, the app will not be able to provide continuously updated prayer times or automatically manage Do Not Disturb mode.

Do Not Disturb mode

This app may also request permission to activate Do Not Disturb (DND) mode on your device. This permission is necessary for the app to function properly by temporarily enabling DND mode to minimize interruptions during prayer times.

While this permission allows the app to control your device\'s sound and vibration settings, we want to explicitly clarify that the app does NOT access, read, or collect any of your notifications, messages, call content, or any other personal data displayed by your notifications. This permission is solely for the purpose of toggling the DND mode on and off.

You acknowledge that while DND mode is active, you may not receive standard notifications, including emergency calls. Our company shall not be held responsible for any consequences resulting from missed notifications and emergency calls, during periods when the app has activated DND mode.

It is your responsibility to configure DND settings and exceptions according to your needs.

We are committed to protecting your privacy. If you have any questions or concerns regarding our privacy practices, please contact us at prayer.mode@outlook.com

For full details of our Privacy Policy, please follow [PRIVACY_LINK].

Thank you for trusting our application.

Before you start using the app
When using for the first time this app, please follow the tips below to configure the settings.
Monthly fetch and Location change detection

"This app fetches the prayer times from the aladhan.com API on the first day of each month and relies on your device\'s location and an active Internet connection. This is to ensure accurate prayer times and proper Do Not Disturb mode functionality. For continuous location change detection when traveling long distances, which is an important functionality of the app, always-on location services and a persistent Internet connection are required."

During Do Not Disturb, the app mutes all sounds and silences vibrations for calls and notifications. However, alarms from the main speaker and the audio from your calls using the earpiece speaker will remain audible. Once DND is off, the sound levels are restored to their last saved values.
Select the preferred calculation method before activating the switch. Please note that the app is using the API of aladhan.com to get accurate prayer times.
Select the durations based on your preferences. Note that the five daily prayers, Jumua, Taraweeh, Tahajjud and Eid prayers have each their own duration.
Choose the time of Al-Fitr and Al-Adha Eid prayer.
By adding the prayer mode tile to Quick Settings, you can access the app more rapidly.
Your connected watch can also receive notifications and follow your phone\'s sound mode, to accomplish that, check your smart watch app settings.

Prayer mode is free and open-source software. Development and maintenance require time and effort.

If you find this app valuable and wish to support its continued development, you can make a voluntary donation.

Donations are voluntary, non-refundable, and do not entitle you to any premium services or features.

They are simply a way to show your appreciation and help ensure the app remains free and updated for everyone.
